casebody.data:
No.

Succession of Igaravídez et al. v. Succession of Gallart et al. -Appeal from the District Court of San Juan, Section 2. Motion to dismiss the appeal. Decided January 31, 1911. Messrs. Antonio Alvarez Nava and José Hernández Usera for petitioners. Mr. Bafael López Landrón for respondents.

Motion overruled.
